EmailTemplate.subject: With mental health needs on the rise, it's time to step up services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
May 2023
Partner Essentials How a whole-person approach to mental healthcare can accelerate progress Conditions like anxiety, depression, substance abuse and suicide have risen sharply in the U.S. In support of Mental Health Awareness Month, Teladoc Health is thinking beyond traditional approaches and building programs that can support a full range of needs with readily accessible care. We invite you to explore our programs and consider the positive change we could make together by proactively addressing mental health.
